modName: Imperial armor to Greek Spartan armor
summary: This mod replaces the armor the Imperial soldiers wear. It also adds an encam...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16930-1-1336842222.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16930-2-1337608934.jpg[/img]


[line]
[center][font=\"Impact\"] Imperial armor to Greek Spartan armor [/font][/center]
[font=\"Impact\"] Imperial armor to Greek Spartan armor [/font]

This mod was created for my own amusement, but I decided to share it with the world.
This mod changes the armor the imperial soldiers wear, it also adds an encampment to the west of whiterun where you can find many soldiers ( including a general) and one unique companion. The companion is called \"Imperial Guard\". There are also new soldiers in the newest update that can now only be found in Solitude and in the encampment. 

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16930-1-1337608933.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16930-3-1337608934.jpg[/img]


Ideas for the future:

A merchant in the encampment

Different armor colors for light, heavy and officer

more encampments throughout the worlds and (maybe) some castles
author: AvatarPedro
